welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Glendale Heights, a charming city known for its friendly community and beautiful parks. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all the wonderful things this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Chicago O'hare International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines, Air Canada, and other select airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Chicago O'hare International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines and select partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal at Chicago O'hare International Airport, serving flights for various international airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport provides all necessary services for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments, equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and equipment.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport, with a network name of 'Municipal Airport WiFi'.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Midway Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
